subject: RE: [Radiance-general] Radiance Ecotect 2011 and Ecote'ct v5
body:
Dear Alexis,



Yes, the results are different and Diego and I would argue that
Ecotect-Split-Flux is wrong
(http://www.gsd.harvard.edu/research/gsdsquare/Publications/BuildingSimu
lation2009.SimulationNovices.pdf).



Christoph



[mailto:radiance-general-bounces@radiance-online.org] On Behalf Of
alexis Loubeyre
Sent: Monday, November 22, 2010 8:57 AM
To: radiance-general@radiance-online.org


Hi everyone,


Does anyone have some troubles with Ecotect 2011 and Radiance for
dayllight Factor Calculation?

When i compare the dyalight factor using Ecotect v5 with radiance or
Ecotect 2011 with Radiance as well, the results are completly different.
Even when i'm only using Ecotect to calculate the Daylight Factor.


Regards,

Alexis
